modName: A Sexy Lydia Replacer CBBE V_05
summary:
Description :
Replace Lydia with a much better looking one !! 
Replace the standard armor with the nightingale armor player 01 version.
Replace the long bow with a Deadric bow and arrow.

 Installation :
==============

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

 Uninstalling :
==============

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete HousecarlWhiterun Lydia sexy.esp from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

 Conflicts :
=============

May conflict with any other mods that change Lydia !!!!
